rules_text:
When Floe Prowler enters the battlefield, traverse Vrok. [i](Planeswalk to Vrok. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
{S}{S}: Floe Prowler becomes a Beast Mutant with base power and toughness 3/3.
{2}{S}{S}: If Floe Prowler is a Mutant, put a double strike counter and a trample counter on it.
